item.title: A Human Metaverse
item.description: Humanity in the Metaverse An innovative new technology is on the rise. It promises bright futures for developers, artists, writers— all aspiring creators. A decentralized, open-source wonderland. It’s called The Internet; an innovation to connectedness rivaled only by the laying of the transcontinental railroad. At least, that’s what was promised. Not too soon after its inception, it transformed from a human platform, to a data extraction platform. Corporations needed increasingly more specific user data to advertise more effectively.
